body:
Hee.


On 2010-06-14 08:22:07 -0700, John Mardaljevic said:


> Randolph's query reminded me that I had a search for cheap domes a 
> while ago.  This is what I found:
> 
> http://www.hammacher.com/publish/75098.asp?cm_mmc=CJ-_-1414665-_-1492714-_-Hammacher+Schlemmer


Difficult 
> 
> to tell from the photo if it is optically suitable, though Fido looks 
> quite happy.  I'd be interested to hear if this is any good as a 
> housing.
> 
> Woof woof!
> 
> -John
